comments.author: jgriffin@mozilla.com
comments.creator: jgriffin@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
The most common grafxbot failure with 4.0b8/4.0b9pre is that in the test

== mask-html-xbl-bound-01.html mask-html-01-ref.svg

the test file is rendered as a blank page.  This happens on all OS's.  See e.g.,

http://sm-brasstacks01.mozilla.org:8100/resultserv/data/testrun/33749/
http://sm-brasstacks01.mozilla.org:8100/resultserv/data/testrun/33764/
comments.text:

comments.creator: mstange.moz@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
This might be a bug in the test - I don't think anything guarantees that the binding has loaded when the snapshot is taken.
How often are changes to tests picked up by grafxbot? Is it worth changing the test now?
comments.text:

How often are changes to tests picked up by grafxbot? Is it worth changing the test now?
comments.author: mstange.moz@gmail.com
jgriffin@mozilla.com
comments.creator: jgriffin@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: I update the tests irregularly, on an as-needed basis.  I can update the tests anytime if you fix a bug in an existing test.
comments.text: I update the tests irregularly, on an as-needed basis.  I can update the tests anytime if you fix a bug in an existing test.
